TELCOM_SCREENSHOT: Take a screenshot of MagicMirror saved in ~/Pictures/ScreenShots/
TELCOM_HELPER_ERROR: An error is occurred. Ask admin.
TELCOM_HELPER_NOT_ALLOWED: You are not allowed to command me. Ask admin.
TELCOM_HELPER_WAKEUP: I've just woken from a deep sleep!
TELCOM_NOT_REGISTERED_COMMAND: Sorry, that command is not registered.
TELCOM_NOT_ALLOWED_COMMAND: You are not allowed to use this command. Ask admin.
TELCOM_HELP:
Show description of commands.
e.g) `/help commands`.
TELCOM_HELP_HELP: To show description of command, try `/help [command_name]`
TELCOM_COMMANDS_ERROR: I cannot find any command. hmmm... weird.
TELCOM_MODULES_ERROR: I cannot find any module. hmmm... weird.
TELCOM_ALLOWUSER: Allow user temporally. This user will lost permission after restart. You can put this user into `allowedUser` in `config.js` for permanent permission.
TELCOM_ONLY_ADMIN: Only admin in his private chat with me can command this.
TELCOM_ALLOWUSER_REGISTERED:
User is registered.
Try `/allowed` for check.
This user will lost permission after restart.
You can put this user into `allowedUser` in `config.js` for permanent permission.
TELCOM_ALLOWUSER_ERROR: I cannot register this user. check the spell or username missing.
TELCOM_FOUND_SEVERAL_COMMANDS: Several commands are searched. Your intention might be one of these:
TELCOM_RECENT: Load recent used commands as keyboard
TELCOM_SHELL_RESULT_SESSION_ERROR: Execution fails by some reason. Sorry.
TELCOM_SCREENSHOT_NULL: You didn't set script name for this feature.
TELCOM_TELECAST: Telecast a chat to MagicMirror screen
TELCOM_TELECAST_FALSE: Telecast is not activated or allowed.
